subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Erik Johnson, a defenseman from Bloomington, Minn., is expected to be the first pick today when the St. Louis Blues open the N.H.L. entry draft at GM Place in Vancouver, British Columbia.
snippet: Erik Johnson, a defenseman from Bloomington, Minn., is expected to be the first pick today when the St. Louis Blues open the N.H.L. entry draft at GM Place in Vancouver, British Columbia.
